overview:
Dave is a successful entrepreneur who co-found three companies. He has been an successful angel investors, CEO, VP Software, CFO, and consultant to start-up businesses.

Dave is a principal at Cloud Strategies â€“ a consulting company that assists software companies in the cloud and mobile spaces in developing and executing their business planning, sales and marketing, and product strategies.

Dave was YouMailâ€™s founding CEO, a Web 100 Internet 2.0 company that is revolutionizing the mobile voice mail experience. Previously, Dave was the Chairman of Zeacom Group a leading call center software ISV.

Dave was co-founder and CEO of FieldCentrix, the leading wireless software and services provider to the field service industry. Dave raised $37 million dollars of private and venture capital funds at FieldCentrix. Dave was a member of the founding team of FileNet, responsible for their original software and coinventor of â€œworkflowâ€ (now Business Process Management) software. FileNet was sold to IBM for $1 billion in 2006.

Dave is an advisory board member for the UC Irvine School of Information and Computer Science and the UC Riverside School of Engineering. Dave is an angel investor focused on software, medical device, and nanotechnology startups.

relationships.title: CFO and EVP of Corporate Ops
